title: Azir Passive gltich or bug?
body:
Ok I will try to make this as short as possible so while I was in a ranked game we were up against an Azir{{champion:268}} .And there was an evelyn on our team and azir used his passive on his turrent and what happen was this: evelyn was about to be targeted and you can know this by the red line indicator that points directly at her to show its aiming her and as it was about to fire she went to stealth. The red indicator line kept following her even though she was stealthed so the enemy team could see where she was going. It was pretty hilarious. But it stopped when the minion wave started attacking it as normal. 
Has this ever happen to you?

replies.body:
I saw a game where an azir would spawn a turret whenever he clicked on the map

he had 26 kills and the game ended in 7 minutes
Wow nice to know not only me experiencing this bug
